EmailTemplate.description: Email sent to customer w/ link to the CS application
EmailTemplate.name: CS App. Email
EmailTemplate.subject: Ready to go solar?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Fresh.Local.Solar
Hi {!Lead.Name},
Are you interested in joining the energy revolution? Sign up for a BlueWave Community Solar Subscription today and join a community of people supporting local solar generation!
Here are a few other reasons to sign up for a BlueWave Community Solar Subscription:
• Reliable Savings - Save on your monthly utility bill. • No Installation Necessary - Receive energy savings without having to invest in a rooftop system. • Good Feelings - Contribute to the production of solar energy.
What are you waiting for?
Sign Up for Fresh, Local Solar Here.
Join the energy revolution today!
- All of us here at BlueWave
BlueWave Customer Care 844.786.4100 | customercare@bluewavesolar.com
